summary: This is a brief email from August 14, 2008, suggesting the nomination of an unnamed individual for the Timothy Evans Award for their work on the Epstein case. It highlights recognition of efforts related to the Epstein investigation.

The Timothy Evans Award is mentioned as a form of recognition for contributions to the Epstein case.
The recipient and sender of the email are not named in the provided text.
